description.value: This is the logical model of the patient's immunization entries in an immunization or vaccination record. The patient immunization record of several entries as modeled here.

short.value: A record of an immunization or vaccination
The business identifier(s) for the immunization entry

definition.value: The business identifier(s) for the immunization entry - This is an optional attribute, used for example to track an entry throughout its lifecycle, or across vaults.

short.value: The status of this immunization record entry

definition.value: The status of the immunization record entry - whether it is active, entered in error, etc.

short.value: The reason for the status e.g. entered in error because ...
The patient that received immunization.

definition.value: The patient that has received the immunization.

short.value: The target of the immunization - the disease that the immunization action is protecting against - e.g. Polio, Tetanus, HPV

definition.value: The target of the immunization - the disease that the immunization action is protecting against. This should be a coded value.

short.value: The dateTime when the immunization has been recorded

definition.value: The date and/or time when the immunization administration has been recorded

short.value: The patient-specific order or recommendation for the immunization

definition.value: The patient-specific order or recommendation for the immunization, for example a prescription or a request for immunization for a patient by a physician, for example for optional vaccines.

short.value: The vaccination plan or protocol (not patient-specific) that this immunization is fulfilling

definition.value: The vaccination plan or protocol (not patient-specific) that this immunization is fulfilling. For example 'Basisvaccinatieschema'

short.value: The type of immunization action - for example first dose or reinforcement.

definition.value: The type of immunization action - for example first dose or reinforcement.

short.value: The professional that recorded the administration of the vaccine

definition.value: The professional that recorded the administration of the vaccine.

short.value: The date and time when the administration of the vaccine was recorded

definition.value: The date and time when the administration of the vaccine was recorded - typically used when the vaccine event is recorded a posteriori.

short.value: The professional that administered the medication

definition.value: The professional that administered the medication.

short.value: The route of administration.

definition.value: The route of administration for the vaccine. This can be free text (not desired) or a code

short.value: The details of the product that was administered.

The actual product that was administered. This can be just text (not desired), or a code (e.g. 1696392 = Neisvac C Dos 0,5ml) or a reference to an actual Medication product (e.g. http://server/Medication/1696392)
The lot number
The expiration date of the product.

definition.value: The expiration date of the product.

short.value: The location of the immunization.

definition.value: The location where the immunization administration was performed. This can be a text (e.g. 'at the physician's office' or a code e.g. '00078' meaning 'patient's home' or a resource (Location) if one exists e.g. 'Location/kind-en-gezin-092375' which could be defining 'Kind en Gezin Gent Koepoortkaai'

short.value: Additional notes for the immunization.
